info.brief_description: you are challenged to a challenge and fail now those who went against you own you now
info.description:
You are challenged to a challenge but you fail now you are under anyone who said you wouldn't do it for one week each and lots of people went against you and the people in charge of you all have been given the power to transform you in any way.

characters

Daniel: 16 short brown hair, averaged size and likes wearing tracksuits and playing games consoles
Rachel: 18 long blond straight hair, always wearing tight clothes and high heels. She goes against Daniel in everything he does (Daniels older sister sister)
Sarah: 14 long brown hair in a ponytail, always dresses in loose clothing and is always doing various sports
More characters will be in the story but won't be mentioned here

Rules
1. the only people who can own daniel more than once are his sisters as it was their idea
2. no swearing
3. Anyone who went with Daniel and said he would complete the challenge or people who didn't know about it carry on as usual
4. mostly transformation uses but I like a few other punishments such as bondage and possibly vore(remember the owners have special powers over him)
5. He must be passed onto the next person who will own him after 3 days
6. No deaths
7. No endings (there are plently of people who can own him so keep it going)
8. Only women owners but other males can be mentioned eg sex but they can't tell them about Daniel or transform anyone else other than Daniel
9. His parents aren't to wonder about him (powers) and rule 3
10. Sex is allowed
11. No one liners only I may do that at a later stage but not often

other than that have fun and make an addition GP is available for good additions
